item.description:
Dig out that old cookbook, you know the one, it has pages stuck together with egg and lots of crusty fingerprints. It falls open to a few much used recipes and you've owned since you were in short pants.

May is recipes from your oldest cookbook! Plan to cook onsite and please bring your old book to share with everyone.

Remember, this is about your creativity and personal interpretation.
Plan to cook onsite unless your recipe takes more than an hour to prepare. The fun is in the cooking here all together.

If you have brought your recipes fully prepared the last few months, make an extra effort to cook onsite this May!

Weather permitting we may be out side in May!
item.how_to_find_us: my home so you will notice me and the dogs will send address a few days before
item.name: The Hartford Cooking And Recipes May Meetup
